paragraph: Maggie Chiang Mei-chi (Chinese: 江美琪; pinyin: Jiāng měiqí) is a Taiwanese singer and songwriter. She is dubbed a "therapeutic singer" (療傷系歌手) by the Chinese-language media for her heartfelt delivery of ballads.
1999: I Love Faye Wong (我愛王菲)
1999: Love at Second Sight (第二眼美女)
2003: Friend of a Friend (朋友的朋友)
2005: Lover's Poem (戀人心中有一首詩)
2018: As Long,As Life (我們都是有歌的人)
2004: Beautiful But Lonely (又寂寞又美麗)
2010: The Weight of Love (愛情的重量)
